title: Help with installing an Ad-on
content: Hi, I need help with installing & testing an add-on. I've co-written the add-on with ChatGpt. When trying to install I get the message "can't install because the add-on appears to be corrupt". I've tried installing with anti-virus & firewall off, added an add-on ID & re-installing FireFox. What should I do? Any help much appreciated ! Regards, /S
creator: snofaeratu

title: I have a new email address also, since I'm now married

title: Can't update to current Firefox
content:
Hi Mozilla friends,

I'm running OSX 10.9.5 and I just can't afford to buy another computer right now, all the more that my iMac works beautifully. I tried and cannot install the current Firefox. What am I to do? Many thanks, - Greg
creator: gerardl.ungerman
